languages.text: "Мы не встречались лично. Этот почтенный логис осуществлял надзор за работой лексмехаников Райкада Минорис на протяжении многих лет. Однако он редко покидал свою инфочасовню, и я не имел чести познакомиться с ним. Настоящий затворник".

"I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."
languages.original_text: "Мы не встречались лично. Этот почтенный логис осуществлял надзор за работой лексмехаников Райкада Минорис на протяжении многих лет. Однако он редко покидал свою инфочасовню, и я не имел чести познакомиться с ним. Настоящий затворник".

traits.locale_text: "I never met him in person. That esteemed logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his data-chapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true hermit."

"I never met him in person. That esteemed logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his data-chapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true hermit."

"I've never met him in person. That esteemed logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

"I've never met him in person. That esteemed logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

"I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

"I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

languages.text: "Ich bin ihm nie persönlich begegnet. Dieser angesehene Logis überwachte viele Jahre lang die Arbeit der Lexmechanici von Rykad Minoris. Er verließ jedoch selten seine Cyberkapelle, und ich hatte nie die Ehre, seine Bekanntschaft zu machen. Ein wahrer Eremit."
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ihm nie persönlich begegnet. Dieser angesehene Logis überwachte viele Jahre lang die Arbeit der Lexmechanici von Rykad Minoris. Er verließ jedoch selten seine Cyberkapelle, und ich hatte nie die Ehre, seine Bekanntschaft zu machen. Ein wahrer Eremit."

languages.text: « Je ne l'ai jamais rencontré en personne. Ce noble logis a supervisé le travail des lexmécaniciens de Rykad Minoris des années durant, mais il quittait rarement sa cyberchapelle, et je n'ai jamais eu l'honneur de faire sa connaissance. Un véritable anachorète. »
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne l'ai jamais rencontré en personne. Ce noble logis a supervisé le travail des lexmécaniciens de Rykad Minoris des années durant, mais il quittait rarement sa cyberchapelle, et je n'ai jamais eu l'honneur de faire sa connaissance. Un véritable anachorète. »

languages.text: “我从未见过他本人。多年以来，这位备受尊敬的逻辑士一直在指导当地思律机僧的工作，但他很少会离开他的机械礼拜堂，我也从来没能有幸认识他。他是一位真正的隐士。”
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: “我从未见过他本人。多年以来，这位备受尊敬的逻辑士一直在指导当地法律技工的工作，但他很少会离开他的机械礼拜堂，我也从来没能有幸认识他。他是一位真正的隐士。”

languages.text: 「私は彼に直接会ったことはない。あの尊敬すべき論理学者は、ライカド・ミノリスの法技術者の仕事を長年にわたって管理していた。しかし、滅多にサイバーチャペルから出ない方で、知り合える名誉な機会は訪れなかった。正真正銘、宗教のために世を捨てた方だ」
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: 「私は彼に直接会ったことはない。あの尊敬すべき論理学者は、ライカド・ミノリスの法技術者の仕事を長年にわたって管理していた。しかし、滅多にサイバーチャペルから出ない方で、知り合える名誉な機会は訪れなかった。正真正銘、宗教のために世を捨てた方だ」

languages.text: «Nunca le he conocido en persona. Ese estimado logos supervisó el trabajo de los Lexmecánicos de Rykad Minoris durante muchos años. Sin embargo, rara vez salía de su cibercapilla, y nunca tuve el honor de conocerle. Un verdadero anacoreta».
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca le he conocido en persona. Ese estimado logos supervisó el trabajo de los Lexmecánicos de Rykad Minoris durante muchos años. Sin embargo, rara vez salía de su cibercapilla, y nunca tuve el honor de conocerle. Un verdadero anacoreta».

languages.text: "Kendisiyle hiç şahsen görüşmedim. Saygıdeğer Logis, uzun yıllar Rykad Minoris'in Lexmekanik işlerini idare etti. Lakin siberşapelinden nadiren çıkardı, dolayısıyla tanışma şerefine erişemedim. Yalnızlığı seven birisiydi."
languages.original_text: "I've never met him in person. That esteemed Logis supervised the work of Rykad Minoris's Lexmechanics for many years. However, he rarely left his cyberchapel, and I never had the honour of making his acquaintance. A true anchorite."

traits.locale_text: "Kendisiyle hiç şahsen görüşmedim. Saygıdeğer Logis, uzun yıllar Rykad Minoris'in Lexmekanik işlerini idare etti. Lakin siberşapelinden nadiren çıkardı, dolayısıyla tanışma şerefine erişemedim. Yalnızlığı seven birisiydi."
